description:
Glazunov was a http://anidb.net/t2322 [Phezzani] official who served as secretary to Phezzan`s ambassador on Odin, http://anidb.net/ch212 [Nikolas Boltik]. He was a party to the Phezzan-sponsored abduction of Kaiser http://anidb.net/ch225 [Erwin Josef II] in 798 UC, communicating with http://anidb.net/ch209 [Leopold Schumacher] and http://anidb.net/ch210 [Alfred von Lansberg], two former http://anidb.net/ch6230 [Lippstadt] officers who were hired for the kidnapping, on Boltik`s behalf.
Source: Gineipaedia
name: Glazunov
